frame.name: Locale_by_collocation
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Profiled_region</fen> is identified as being the region where an <fen>Entity</fen> is located.
<ex>State <fex name="Entity">your</fex> <t><fex name="Profiled_region">location</fex></t>.</ex>
<ex>I can't get a lock on <fex name="Entity">their</fex> <t><fex name="Profiled_region">position</fex></t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Profiled_region
FE.definition:
<def-root>The region where the <fen>Entity</fen> is located.
<ex>If you sign up for this new service, we can get a fix on your phone's <t><fex name="reg">location</fex></t> if you lose it or it is stolen.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Relative_location
FE.definition:
<def-root>A place that a <fen>Profiled_region</fen> is located with respect to.
<ex>Once you have indicated your <t>location</t> <fex name="Relative_location">next to a shopping mall</fex>, you can access the full array of our services on your mobile device.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Formational_cause
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates the action (or causer) which brings the features of the <fen>Profiled_region</fen> about. This FE should also include words that indicate that there was no salient formation. </def-root>

FE.name: Container_possessor
FE.definition: <def-root>The location that the <fen>Profiled_region</fen> is a part of.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Descriptor</fen> is a temporary condition of the <fen>Profiled_region</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Related_event
FE.definition: <def-root>An event related to the <fen>Profiled_region</fen> in some way other than (1) Formational_cause (which is a separate FE) or an intended use (which would place the instance in Locale_by_use), or (3) a defining event (which would place the instance in Locale_by_event).</def-root>

FE.name: Inherent_purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The activity that is carried out in the <fen>Profiled_region</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The entity is located at the <fen>Profiled_region</fen>.
<ex>If you sign up for this new service, we can get a fix on <fex name="Entity">your phone's</fex> <t>location</t> if you lose it or it is stolen.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Entity</fen> is at the <fen>Profiled_region</fen>.
<ex>Any updates on his <fex name="tim">current</fex> <t>location</t>?</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: position.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the location of an entity.

lexUnit.name: location.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a region identified by where something is.
